Translations.Text: That is how God the powerful, the wise, reveals to you and to those before you
Whatever in the skies and whatever on the earth belongs to Him, and He is the superior, the great
The skies are about to tear apart from above them, and the angels glorify their Master with praise and ask forgiveness for whoever is on the earth. Know that indeed God is the forgiving, the merciful
And those who took protectors (and supporters) other than Him, God is guarding over them, and you are not their advocate

And that is how We revealed an Arabic Quran to you, so that you warn (the people of) the mother of the towns (Mecca) and its vicinity, and you warn of the day of assembly which there is no doubt in it, a group in the garden and a group in the burning fire
And if God wanted, He would have made you a single community (of faith), but He admits anyone He wants into His mercy. And the wrongdoers have no protector and no helper
Or did they take protectors other than God? Whereas God is the protector and He gives life to the dead and He is capable of everything
And anything you disagree about it, then its judgment (and decision) is with God. That is God, my Master, I trust in Him and I return to Him (in repentance)
